summary: AFTER READING NUMEROUS OF ONLINE COMPLAINTS ABOUT GAS SMELL COMING FROM 05 PONTIAC G6. CAR HAS STRONG FUMES COMING INSIDE CABIN AND OUTSIDE CARE WHEN CAR IS EITHER IN MOTION OR PARKED NOT RUNNING. I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF THERE IS A RECALL BEFORE I TAKE CAR TO DEALERSHIP OR LOCAL MECHANIC TO BE LOOKED AT.
